text: The Barmera-Monash Football Club is an Australian rules football club which competes in the Riverland Football League. The club was formed in 1957 following a merger between the Monash and Barmera clubs who both played in Upper Murray Football League. The club developed a reputation as a bridesmaid as it lost the first nine grand finals it played in. ==Premierships== *1921, 1983, 1984, 1985, 1986, 1987, 1989, 2012 ==References== == External links == * RFL League Website Category:Australian rules football clubs established in 1957 Category:1957 establishments in Australia Category:Australian rules football clubs in South Australia
title: Barmera-Monash Football Club
